title: e-fgs-c47003-14
text: Date Ministry of Finance Revenue Administration EU and External Relations Department EU Branch Ref: Communiqué date 20 May 2005 and no 25820 published in the Official Gazette In the framework of Turkey – European Union Framework Agreement General Communiqué dated 20 May 2005 and no 25820, as XXXXX (institution name) , we submit attached the application file prepared for application of value added tax, private consumption tax, stamp duty as well as inheritance and succession tax exemptions on procurement of goods and services in the scope of projects financed by European Union or jointly. Our institution has signed a project contract, numbered 1111111( Contract – Agreement no of project), effective date being 01.01.2005 (contract date) and titled “xxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxxx (Extended title of project) (xxxx) (project acronym) ” for a period of xx months with the European Commission in the framework of European Union Sixth Framework Program. In this project, the total budget allocated to XXXXX (institution name) is 11.111-Euro. We kindly request implementation of tax exemption related to goods and services to be supplied from the related project throughout the term of project. Kind regards, Authorized Signature
